title: 10 משרות חמות למפתחי Full Stack ו-Java
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם

קרדיט תמונה: Getty Images Israel
אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
– Work with the analytical teams to build and improve Riskified’s proprietary machine learning and predictive models’ subsystems.
– Assess and adopt new available technologies.
– Optimize the application for maximum speed and scalability while writing high quality, reusable and reliable code.
– Design the overall architecture of the machine learning application.
– Translate R research code to Ruby production code.
– Use TDD to write well-tested code.
– Fix bugs fast and improve application performance.
Requirements:
– At least 3-5 years of recent hands-on coding and software design.
– Proficient knowledge of a back-end programming language, preferably Ruby.
– Someone who can plan and design the system from a high level perspective.
– Autodidactic approach to software development, and ability to work on a wide range of development platforms.
– Solid OOP and software design knowledge – you should know how to create software that’s extensible, reusable and meets desired architectural objectives.
– Can handle Math/Statistics algorithms and transform them to workable code.
– Highly data-driven, knowledge of SQL.
To send a CV for the position of Fullstack Developer – Riskified
– Design and implement methods to run detection algorithms in realtime
– Scale up the internals of our data processing server vertically and horizontally
– Investigate production bottlenecks and invent smart ways to solve them
– Work closely with the security and endpoint teams
– Take part in defining the customer-facing product aspects of the server
Requirements:
– Familiarity with JAVA.
– Great passion for building high-performance, beautifully architectured products.
– Superior analytical and troubleshooting skills.
– Great interpersonal skills – a must.
– BSc from a known university or relevant military background – an advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Java Developer – Cybereason
– You will be part of a small start-up feel group within a global corporate expansion.
– You will design, develop, debug, deploy, maintain and deliver large-scale, highly distributed, real-time system that is the core of serving millions of vehicles.
– You will work in an agile development environment.
Requirements:
– Extraordinary coding skills in Pure Java – at least 5 years expieriance as a software developer
– Unique ability to write your own code better and faster than integrating existing frameworks.
– Hands on experience working with global enterprise SW systems.
– Self-directed and capable of performing effectively in a dynamic environment
– Knowledge / Experience in development for WebLogic.
– Rich, hands-on experience developing with HTML, XML, Oracle and Linux/Unix.
– Unix system administration experience – advantage.
– Effective collaboration within a multinational team.
To send a CV for the position of Senior Java Engineer/Architect – General Motors – ג’נרל מוטורס
– Working closely with other team members, SW Architect and SW TL, suggesting ideas and brainstorming.
– Developing and maintaining a product that involves entertainment with IoT from concept
to delivery.
Requirements:
– B.Sc. /B.A. in computer science/computer engineering/electronic engineering OR equivalent.
– 4+ years of experience in Software engineering in Java, server side expertise.
– Experience with large backend / server / cloud systems / complex data systems.
– Architecture & Design experience, frameworks assessment & POCs.
– Excellent written and spoken English.
– Proven background and love for working in high paced environment, dealing with real time changes.
To send a CV for the position of Experienced Java Engineer – AGT International
– Design, develop, implement and move to production web based systems/tools.
– Work with new technologies and high system availability.
– Build deep partnerships with business, product management and technology leaders.
Requirements:
– 3+ years hands on JavaScript: Node.js, npm, gulp, webpack.
– 2+ years in Front End: HTML, CSS.
– 3+ years in Back End: PHP or Java, OOP.
– Experience with SQL/NoSQL databases.
– Experience with Angular and React – big advantage.
– Experience with Linux, AWS, Apache/Nginx/Tomcat – advantage.
– Work in agile/scrum environment – advantage.
– Web technologies – advantage.
– B.Sc in mathematics / computer science or similar.
– Experience in AdTech industry – advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack / Web Developers – anyclip
Adallom (Acquired by Microsoft) is developing the next generation of security tools, when your data is outside your network, and firewalls and perimeters don’t work.
Our technology allows organizations to protect their data in the cloud from any location, device or network (Wow! It’s magic!)
If you’re an awesome team player, looking to work in a live, vibrant environment, where you can contribute, learn and influence – your place is with us!
Requirements:
– B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Computer Science, Software and Computer Engineering, or equivalent
– 4+ years of experience in Client-side development experience – JavaScript.
– Team player skills, effectiveness both in independent and collaborative work.
– Ability to learn and use new technologies.
– Ability to understand complex distributed systems and troubleshoot them.
– Passion to agile development methodology.
Desired skills:
– Working experience using Angular and/or React development frameworks.
– Experience in Python/Django (our back-end).
– Background in data security and cloud-based applications.
– Experience with non-relational databases (MongoDB, ElasticSearch preferred).
– Experience with Linux-based environments.
– Experience with continuous integration and deployment tools (Jenkins, Chef preferred).
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Software Engineer – Microsoft
– Build our main web application and products for millions of consumers.
– Full-stack development of features and user interfaces of Payoneer’s consumer world, all the way from the UI (React) to the database.
– Analyze and solve difficult issues across the stack in the complex payments flows.
– Design and build high scale back-end services.
– Collaborate with our amazing people; Product Designers, Product Managers, and Software Engineers in an agile development environment.
Requirements:
– 4+ years of web applications development experience.
– Hands on experience with web applications that are live in production, serving a large amount of clients.
– Excellent OOD, C# and .NET skills.
– Strong front-end capabilities – JavaScript, CSS3.
– Knowledge of relational databases and SQL (preferred MSSQL).
– Exceptional self-learning capabilities.
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Developer – Payoneer
The IBM mobile platform is part of the IBM cloud solution and the basis of IBM’s mobile strategy. The mobile team is growing significantly and is looking for an awesome developer to join the team. This developer will participate in all aspects of the platform development lifecycle – design, development, testing, etc.
Requirements:
– B.Sc. in computer science (completed in the last 3 years). Please make sure to add your updated grade sheet to your application.
– 1-2 years hands-on server development experience (Java, node.js, C#).
– Excellent design and programming skills.
– Good English communication skills.
– Candidate should be motivated and be able to learn new state-of-the-art programming languages and technologies. Creative thinking and the ability to work in a team are required
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Developer-University Graduate –IBM
– Take a part and lead in the design and development of infrastructures, applicative modules, data platform modules, interfacing with enormous amounts of data.
– Design and hands-on development of our business technology applicative platform (AngularJS, Node.js, JavaScript, Java, MySQL, Elasticsearch…).
– Design and develop scalable and high-performance processes handling the data, through new technologies implementation, architectures, algorithms and practices.
– Responsible for the design and development of client side and server side modules in SOA and Microservices environments.
– Responsible for selecting and integrating technologies, tools and frameworks.
– Full involvement in full stack layers (Server, User Interface, User Experience, Data Modeling, Network, Hosting…).
Requirements:
– At least 5 years of SW development experience.
– Expert in JavaScript (at least 2 years).
– Firm experience in AngularJS.
– Firm experience in Node.js – an advantage.
– Expert in both web based client side development and server side development.
– Experience in Java or other object oriented programming language.
– Experience in SOA or Microservices environment – an advantage.
– Experienced with Linux OS – an advantage.
– Experience with big data ecosystem (distributed file systems, distributed programing, NoSQL Databases) – an advantage.
– Experienced with big data technologies (like Kafka, Hadoop, HDFS, Spark, Impala, Elasticsearch) – an advantage.
– Experienced with NoSQL databases (such as HBase, Cassandra, MongoDB and Impala) and relational databases (such as MySQL and SQL Server) – an advantage.
– Experienced with Cloud hosting (AWS, Google Cloud …) – an advantage.
– Relevant academic degree (Computer Science / Industrial Engineering / Information Systems).
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Developer – Plarium
– Take an active role in defining the shape of the future of online video.
– Develop high scale and performance applications with service oriented architecture.
– Work in an agile development methodology.
– Design and develop using cutting edge open source technologies.
– High potential to grow and evolve in an exciting international company.
Requirements:
– 5+ years’ development experience using Java and related technologies – A must.
– Strong problem solving and coding skills – A must.
– Excellent communication skills – A must.
– Extensive experience with Spring Framework – A must.
– Experience with JavaScript, CSS and HTML – An advantage.
– Experience with test driven development – An advantage.
– Experience working with open source JavaScript libraries (Angular.JS) – An advantage.
– Experience working with relational databases (SQL ServerOracle) – An advantage.
– Experience working with non-relational databases MongoDBCassandraCouchbase) – An advantage.
– B.Sc.B.A. in computer science.
To send a CV for the position of Java Developer – Aol
keywords: fullstack developer,riskified,java developer,cybereason,senior java engineer/architect,general motors – ג’נרל מוטורס experienced java engineer,agt international,full stack / web developers,anyclip,full stack software engineer,microsoft,full stack developer,payoneer,full stack developer-university graduate,ibm,plarium,aol,דרושים,מהנדסים,מנהלים,משרות,משרות בהיי-טק
